display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): Apneas with >= 5% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 5% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of REM sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp5 + hrop5 + carbp5 + carop5 + oarbp5 + oarop5 ) / minremp
